item.title: TryHackMe Internal
item.description: OverView Follow @anir0y internal Room [Subscription Required] internalhttps://tryhackme.com/room/internal Task 01: Pre-engagement Briefing The client requests that an engineer conducts an external, web app, and internal assessment of the provided virtual environment. The client has asked that minimal information be provided about the assessment, wanting the engagement conducted from the eyes of a malicious actor (black box penetration test). The client has asked that you secure two flags (no location provided) as proof of exploitation:
